mapper.select: select dic.dic_id, eng.word_id as eng_id, eng.word as eng_word, mon.mean_id as mon_id, mon.definition as mon_word, date_format(dic.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as reg_date, date_format(dic.reg_date, '%m-%d') as reg_month_day from vocabulary.voc_dic dic left join vocabulary.voc_word eng on (dic.eng_voc_id = eng.word_id) left join vocabulary.voc_mean mon on (dic.mon_voc_id = mon.mean_id) where dic.user_id = #{id} order by reg_date desc, dic_id asc;
